ingredients.item: 1 red onion, peeled and finely sliced
2 x 400g cans cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
400g can borlotti beans, rinsed and drained
225g pack Waitrose 1 Golden Baby Plum Tomatoes, halved
280g jar Cooks’ Ingredients Chargrilled Peppers In Olive Oil, drained, oil reserved
25g pack flat leaf parsley, leaves only, roughly torn
½ clove garlic, peeled and crushed
½ x15g pack oregano, leaves only, finely chopped

instructions.step: Put the onion into a bowl, add the salt and sugar and toss to coat. Knead gently for 3-4 minutes until softened, then add the beans, tomatoes, peppers and parsley.

For the dressing whisk together 4 tbsp of the reserved oil from the peppers with the dressing ingredients and season to taste. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat. Just before serving add the baby kale.
